name: Carolina Agurto Gangas
sub_title: ESO-Comité Mixto Postdoctoral researcher at Universidad de Chile

home.description: I am an ESO-Comité Mixto postdoctoral researcher in the Astronomy Department at Universidad de Chile. My main research interests focus on the early stages of protoplanetary disks, investigating both the characterization of the dusty envelope and the processes of dust growth within the disk by using sub-mm and mm wavelengths. Currently, I'm working in the gas and dust characterization of the ALMA Large Program AGE-PRO (the ALMA survey of Gas Evolution in PROtoplanetary disks).

papers.title: Dust analysis of the cosmic pretzel by using Band 3, 6 and 7 ALMA datasets
Dynamical masses and disk envelope transition of the AGE-PRO Ophiuchus sample
Dynamical masses in the Upper Sco AGE-PRO sample

papers.abstract: Here you can find links to useful radiative transfer and interferometric data fitting tools
You can check out my full record of authored and co-authored publications on

Star Tres was founded in 2013 by Javiera Rey, Karina Rojas and myself during our Bachelor (Universidad de Valparaíso).

- Star Tres is a digital initiative composed by a website, social media, and a YouTube channel.
- Our main goal is to be a reliable source of information with simple and engaging content for all astronomy-lover public.
- We also advocate gender equality in STEM and critical thinking in our society.
All of our content is in Spanish, to fill the lack of Latin American astronomy outreach initiatives on the internet.
